name: dissemination
description: Lightweight event/command library created to replace Backbone.Radio

scripts.build: npm run transpile && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.browserify: mkdirp dist && browserify lib/dissemination.js --standalone dissemination -o dist/dissemination.js -d
scripts.test:coverage: istanbul cover _mocha -- --recursive --require babel-register test && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm test && npm run rebuild

author: Dmitriy Pushkov <ezze@ezze.org>
